title: HELP! Script font
content:
Anyone have any idea what this font might be?

Font: 

 Adios Script Pro 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_42.jpg) | 120.48 KB |
author: adechong

comments.content: Very late but I think it's because it looks a bit bolder on your sample but could be Ale Paul's [Adios Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro) using some stylistic alternates: / [l](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/522768/923), / [e](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/522768/607), / [k](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063117/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/adios-script-pro/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/522768/891)...
